dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're making driving lessons, like, mandatory for everyone, right? Starting... next month?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're making driving lessons, like, mandatory for everyone, right? Starting... next month?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A member of Kyrgyzstan™s Jogorku Kenesh, Bekmyrza Ergeshov, has proposed introducing driving lessons in schools... This subject should be introduced for 10th- and 11th-grade students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, no, no, not everyone! You're thinking of, uh, Kyrgyzstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, no, no, not everyone! You're thinking of, uh, Kyrgyzstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A member of Kyrgyzstan™s Jogorku Kenesh, Bekmyrza Ergeshov, has proposed introducing driving lessons in schools...

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, Kyrgyzstan! My bad. But still, in school? That's, like, huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, Kyrgyzstan! My bad. But still, in school? That's, like, huge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Bekmyrza Ergeshov, a parliament member, he proposed it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Bekmyrza Ergeshov, a parliament member, he proposed it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A member of Kyrgyzstan™s Jogorku Kenesh, Bekmyrza Ergeshov, has proposed introducing driving lessons in schools...

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: For 10th and 11th graders! To replace, like, those private schools.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For tenth and eleventh graders! To replace, like, those private schools.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This subject should be introduced for 10th- and 11th-grade students... Everyone wants to drive, but only private schools profit from this, and who knows how well they teach?

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Which are, you know, just profiting. And Ergeshov's like, who knows how well they teach?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which are, you know, just profiting. And Ergeshov's like, who knows how well they teach?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Everyone wants to drive, but only private schools profit from this, and who knows how well they teach?

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! He said people struggle even after a year and a half.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! He said people struggle even after a year and a half.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Some people struggle to pass driving tests even after a year and a half in private schools.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: It's true! They used to teach road safety and, uh, operating machinery. Tractors!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's true! They used to teach road safety and, uh, operating machinery. Tractors!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He recalled that Kyrgyz schools previously taught road safety and operated machinery, including tractors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Tractors in high school? That's amazing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tractors in high school? That's amazing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! But the Minister of Education, Dogdurkul Kendirbaeva, she actually said similar courses are already planned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! But the Minister of Education, Dogdurkul Kendirbaeva, she actually said similar courses are already planned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, Kyrgyzstan™s Minister of Education, Dogdurkul Kendirbaeva, noted that similar courses are already planned...

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Part of their whole 12-year system transition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Part of their whole twelve-year system transition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...similar courses are already planned as part of the country's transition to a 12-year education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: So, it's already kind of happening, uh, just officially.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it's already kind of happening, uh, just officially.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Makes total sense. Why pay, like, a fortune for private when schools can just do it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes total sense. Why pay, like, a fortune for private when schools can just do it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And speaking of parliament, they also want to unblock TikTok there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And speaking of parliament, they also want to unblock TikTok there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, members of the Kyrgyz Parliament called for the unblocking of TikTok in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right! I totally forgot about that. A whole other thing, but, um, yeah.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right! I totally forgot about that. A whole other thing, but, um, yeah.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Just, you know, an eventful time in Kyrgyzstan politics, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Just, you know, an eventful time in Kyrgyzstan politics, I guess.
